Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Everything we offer is designed to help you reach the Top.

camp.title: Kids' Summer Camp
camp.description: A summer full of inspiring experiences and activities that mix fun with knowledge.
camp.slogan: “Open for children — limited spots per session.”

courses.title: Courses & Workshops
courses.description: Fast, hands-on training in high-demand fields like tech, design, marketing and much more.

events.title: Event Concept & Organization
events.description: From concept to execution - we help communities organize youth-led events with impact.
events.slogan: “Designed for those bringing ideas to life.”

studio.title: Studio & Creative Support
studio.description: Need to film, record, or launch your brand? Our studio supports creators and small businesses.
studio.slogan: “Ideal for promo videos, product shoots, or online content.”

Hero.subtitle: And between you and reaching it… is simply believing in your first step.

About.title: What is Qimma?
About.subtitle1: Qimma is where those who believe the future is made — not awaited — come together.
About.subtitle2: We give young people the space to learn, explore, and carve their own path.

practice.title: Practical Learning
practice.desc: Don't settle for knowledge… apply it to achieve results.

creativity.title: Creativity & Innovation
creativity.desc: Ideas that challenge norms and shape the future.

byYouth.desc: We know the journey — we’re walking it too.

learnByDoing.title: Teach Through Practice
learnByDoing.desc: Less talk… more work. That’s the path to success.

flexible.title: Flexible & Collaborative
flexible.desc: We adapt, co-create, and let youth lead.

livingSpace.title: Living Learning Space
livingSpace.desc: A place where you learn in an interactive way.

Footer.desc: You're closer to the top than you think.
